item.description:
Join us for a night of English pub-style fun at the British Beer Company in Pembroke. It offers an eclectic menu, extensive beer and cocktail choices, and an array of music nightly.
As one might expect from a place called the British Beer Company, they offer an unparalleled selection of beers, ales, lagers, stouts and pilsners from the UK, Ireland and Europe. They also sell the cream of American brew too-from the big national brands we all love on game day, to some of the more unique craft brews produced with love and fanaticism by the country's best microbrewers. Whether it's a smooth, classic British ale, a rich stout, a crisp Belgian Abbey brew or a bracing IPA from the good old U.S. of A., there is no better place to hoist a pint and offer "Cheers!" all around than the British Beer Company.

Visit their website for a complete menu listing: http://www.britishbee...

Event date: Saturday, June 23 6:30PM

The British Beer Company
15 Columbia Road
Pembroke, MA
781.829.6999

Event organizer: Jen
Event Fee: $2pp
Prices range between $6-$20
RSVP Deadline: 4:00PM on Thursday, June 21

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.


Directions:

From Rte 3 take exit 12 (Marshfield/Pembroke)
Traveling south take a left off the exit onto rte 139, the 99 restaurant will be right in front of you at the intersection
Traveling north take a right off the exit onto rte 139, you will pass under rte 3 and the 99 restaurant will be on the right
Follow about 3-4 miles to end where 139 intersects with rte 53
Take a right onto rte 53
The BBC is on the left less than a Â¼ mile after the turn

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group
